name: polaroid3
description: It's covered in a fine layer of dust. It's a picture of this house. The view is from the street, and you recognize two of the trees from the front yard, but the third is missing.

verbInteractions.Flip: There's a number 7 on the back.
verbInteractions.Examine: It's a picture of this house. The view is from the street, and you recognize two of the trees from the front yard, but the third is missing.
verbInteractions.Take: You brush off most of the dust and take the Dusty Polaroid with you.
verbInteractions.Drop: You put the Dusty Polaroid down.
